scripts.install:all: npm install && cd ai-cold-caller-crm && npm install && cd ../trade-lead-generator && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd ai-cold-caller-crm && npm run dev" "cd trade-lead-generator && npm run dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd ai-cold-caller-crm && npm run build && cd ../trade-lead-generator && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.test:all: npm test && cd ai-cold-caller-crm && npm test && cd ../trade-lead-generator && npm test && cd ..
